sentences.english: Objective To observe the therapeutic effect of pericarpium zanthoxylum oil on experimental hyperlipemia in mice.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察花椒仁油對實驗性高脂血症小鼠的治療作用。

sentences.english: It is mainly used to cure Hyperlipemia caused by block of blood and phlegm.
sentences.chinese: 主要用於治療痰溼血瘀型高脂血症。

sentences.english: If the degreasing lipoprotein is insufficient or defective, it will lead to hyperlipaemia.
sentences.chinese: 如果脫脂脂蛋白不足或有缺陷，將會出現高脂血症。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate effect of leaf of persimmon oral solution on serum lipid levels of rats with experimental hyperlipemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究柿葉乙醇提取物對大鼠高脂血症的治療作用。

sentences.english: In addition, development of diabetes in the hyperlipidemic state further down-regulates the connexins.
sentences.chinese: 另外，在高脂血症時糖尿病的發生進一步下調連接素。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the therapeutic effect of Ganan decoction in hyperlipidemic fatty hepatitis.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價肝安湯對高脂血症性脂肪性肝炎的療效。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effects and safety of Xuezhikang in elderly patients with hyperlipidemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察血脂康對老年高脂血症的療效和安全性。

sentences.english: The incidence of PIH increased in GDM patients with hyperlipidemia.
sentences.chinese: GDM併發高脂血症時妊高徵發病明顯增加。

sentences.english: Objective: To observe the therapeutic effect of Tangzhi decoction on type 2 diabetes mellitus (DM2) complicated with hyperlipidemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解糖脂飲治療2型糖尿病伴高脂血症臨牀療效。

sentences.english: The inherent relation exists between DM and hypertension as well as hyperlipidemia.
sentences.chinese: DM與高血壓及高脂血症之間存在着內在關係。

sentences.english: Pure corpulence and high fat blood disease are clinical frequently-occurring disease in recent years.
sentences.chinese: 單純性肥胖並高脂血症是近些年來臨牀常見多發病。

sentences.english: Conclusion Zanthoxylum oil has a therapeutic effect on hyperlipemia in mice.
sentences.chinese: 結論花椒仁油具有治療小鼠高脂血症的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the effect of combined therapy on kidney impaired by hyperlipidaemia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高脂血症腎損害的綜合治療效果。

sentences.english: Spleen deficiency syndrome and combined hyperlipidemia with a certain correlation.
sentences.chinese: 脾腎陽虛證與混合型高脂血症具有一定的相關性。

sentences.english: This capsule can be used for prevention and treatment of patients with hyperlipemia .
sentences.chinese: 本品可用於高脂血症的預防和治療，無明顯毒副作用。

sentences.english: Conclusion Tiaozhi granule has good clinical effect in treating hyperlipoproteinemia.
sentences.chinese: 結論調脂顆粒治療高脂血症有較好的臨牀療效。

pinyin: dong4 mai4 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4

definition: chronic illness/disease that takes effect slowly

pinyin: xue4 guan3 zhou1 yang4 ying4 hua4
